alert.note: Alert for Calhoun Islands; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 10:21PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, southern Victoria, eastern Goliad and northeastern Refugio Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1021 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Schroeder to near Magnolia Beach. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Seadrift, McFaddin, Port Oconnor, Fannin, Schroeder, Indianola, Bloomington, Long Mott, Coleto Creek Park, Green Lake, Oak Village, Tivoli, Matagorda Island State Park and Austwell. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 636 and 652. US Highway 59 between mile markers 642 and 674. US Highway 77 between mile markers 584 and 608. US Highway 87 near mile marker 834. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun Islands; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
